name: @thegraid/wspbclient
description: Protocol handler for Client-Group protocol CgProto

scripts.pub: npm run build; npm version ${1:-patch}; npm publish --access public
scripts.make-patch: cp src/CgProto.ts src/proto/CgProto-patched.ts; npm run protots; (cd src; diff -patch CgProto.ts proto/CgProto-patched.ts > proto/CgProto.patch); npm run patch-proto
scripts.note: jest/babel produce unusable .js: class constructor cannot be invoked without new
scripts.jest1: npm run makejest; jest --runInBand --force-exit --verbose test/dist/test/*.spec.js Xnomsgs
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run protots; npm run patch-proto; npm run tsc; date

author: Jeff Peck <jpeckj@gmail.com> (http://thegraid.com/)
